signature.model_fields: {'hand': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': "The player's hole cards", '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Hand:'}), 'table_cards': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': 'The community cards on the table', '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Table Cards:'}), 'position': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': "Player's position at the table", '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Position:'}), 'pot_size': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=False, default=0.0, json_schema_extra={'desc': 'Current size of the pot', '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Pot Size:'}), 'stack_size': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=False, default=0.0, json_schema_extra={'desc': "Player's remaining stack", '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Stack Size:'}), 'opponent_stack': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=False, default=0.0, json_schema_extra={'desc': "Opponent's remaining stack", '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Opponent Stack:'}), 'game_type': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': 'Type of game being played', '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Game Type:'}), 'opponent_tendency': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': "Opponent's playing style and tendencies", '__dspy_field_type': 'input', 'prefix': 'Opponent Tendency:'}), 'action': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='fold', json_schema_extra={'desc': 'Recommended poker action', '__dspy_field_type': 'output', 'prefix': 'Action:'}), 'reasoning': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='', json_schema_extra={'desc': 'Explanation for the recommended action', '__dspy_field_type': 'output', 'prefix': 'Reasoning:'})}
